Key Match Events: Dallas Mavericks went on a game-changing 17-0 run in the first quarter
Chicago went on a run in the second quarter with Josh Giddey making a 3-point to help pull the Bulls to 43-37
Dallas went on a 13-0 run to open the second half
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chicago played without All-Star Zach LaVine (adductor strain)
Dallas lost another big man when Daniel Gafford took a knee to the thigh from Vucevic in the second quarter
Others: Kyrie Irving had 17 points in the first quarter
Nikola Vucevic finished with a team-high 14 points in 25 minutes
Klay Thompson finished with 13 points and was 3-for-7 from beyond the arc
